answers.text:
Hello Godwin,
I've found some monthly and annual reports, hopefully one or two will give you ideas for creating a template.
The City of Charlottesville has put out a sample monthly report in which projects report their scope, status, schedule, and a cost breakdown:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303803/Sample_Monthly_CIP_Report
This annual report from Clive organizes programs in terms of costs, results, and priority:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/304016/Core_Program_Listing_FY_2012
The National League of Cities put out a report on the fiscal status of cities which lays out complex statistics in a clean manner:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301687/City_Fiscal_Conditions_2010
Gabe Brehm
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: Godwin Chen
text:
Hello All,
My municipality is looking to include information regarding annual departmental accomplishments and statistics into our annual report (2011 report attached). I have been tasked with creating a template for our departments to complete. Does anyone know of annual reports that contain similar information? I would appreciate any help in pointing me in the right direction. Thank you.
Godwin Chen,
ICMA Fellow, City of Evanston
title: Annual Reports Including Departmental Accomplishments and Statistics
